name: MO-Space Project
description:
Welcome to my little endless space game. As the name itself says, this is just a small project to play around with some of the space genre mechanics.  Any feedback would be greatly appreciated :)

How to play:

  • Move your mouse to make your ship look in any direction. 
  • Use WASD to use your ship's thrusters.
  • Shoot with any selected weapon by pressing the left click in your mouse.
  • Cycle between both of the weapons at your disposal using your mouse wheel.


Extra credits:

  • Space skybox by PULSAR BYTES
  • Laser icon by Picons.me
  • Rocket icon by Rudezstudio
  • Mouse scroll icon by kisscc0
